alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Calloway; Christian; Fulton; Graves; Hickman; Hopkins; Lyon; Marshall; Muhlenberg; Todd; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 23 at 6:28PM EDT until April 01 at 9:01PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of western Kentucky, including the following counties, Caldwell, Calloway, Christian, Fulton, Graves, Hickman, Hopkins, Lyon, Marshall, Muhlenberg, Todd and Trigg. * WHEN...Through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Some areas may see more significant and widespread flash flooding with road closures and washouts, water entering normally dry areas, and dangerous travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Periods of rain and thunderstorms are expected from tonight through Friday night. 2 to 4 inches of rain is expected across the watch area with locally higher amounts possible. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Calloway; Christian; Fulton; Graves; Hickman; Hopkins; Lyon; Marshall; Muhlenberg; Todd; Trigg
